tool.name: Raxify_FASTA
tool.description: Alters FASTA headers for more consistent use in FASTA2PHYLIPe for RAxML
tool.help:
**What it does**
Truncates FASTA header to 50 characters then replaces spaces, pipes and periods with underscores.
------
**Inputs**
FASTA
------
**Outputs**
PHYLIP extended
------
**Additional Information**
